text: Hey, is it possible to set requirements for an App on which HubSpot subscription that is needed for an install?
I wanted to explore the possibilities in developing the app  using chrome extensions can anyone share me the proper docs

It’s all based on your scoping within your App. Here’s a screenshot showing a portal doesn’t have the complete access to use an App.

So for example, if your scope includes graphql it make sure the portal looking at the app has an Enterprise Hub.
